code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{createPost}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NewPost(){const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[content,setContent]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await createPost({title,content});alert("Post created!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Create a New Post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Content",value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});}export default NewPost;
